creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
description: green glass vessel with metal plating; rounded base with small flat foot flaring slightly outward and inward toward thick rim; green glass squares in graduated rows--smaller at center of vessel; rectangular plate/base with radiating squares of clear glass, indented into dark metal plate
marks: Signature, Title and Date on one glass square on base, incised: [Michael M.
title: XTC
